name: Jorin
goal:
Collect secrets as currency.
Needed Object: Rare Coin
Treasure: Secret Message
Dialogue Hooks:
dialogue_hooks:
"You can learn more from a drunk’s mumble than a priest’s sermon."
"Funny thing, someone matching your look passed through here last night… paid in foreign coin."
veil_connection: Tracks dreams from travelers that are eerily identical; keeps a book of them.
